Proper Form Key Points: Scoop belly back as you reach.
Reach leg long out of hip.
Zip legs together as they out.
Lift bottom waist away from mat.
Pull hips up using lower abs.
Hips stay stacked; no roll back.
Pivot on toes; chest to floor.
Circle only as big as stable.
Keep glutes relaxed; use deep abs.
Ribs knitted down; no back arch.
Lift with abs; don't roll on neck.
Hips stay square to the floor.
Straight line from head to heels.
Back flat; do not bounce hips.
Lower back glued to the floor.
Glass of water on back; don't spill.

Description: Vigorously pump arms; legs at eye level.
Proper Form Key Points: Curl from ribs; low back anchored.

Description: Legs reach over head, lift to ceiling.
Proper Form Key Points: Use core to lift; don't roll on neck.
Sit tall on sit-bones; move from back.

Description: Prone on box; press out and lift.

Proper Form Key Points: Keep chest wide; eyes on mat.

Description: Pull straps to side in 'T' shape.
Proper Form Key Points: Don't let shoulders hike to ears.

Description: Lie on box; circle arms and legs.

Proper Form Key Points: Roll up and down with control.

Description: Round back; scoop belly over strap.
Hinge back with a flat spine.

Proper Form Key Points: Rotate from the base of ribs.
Straight line from head to heel.
Open heart; don't sink in back.

Description: Flat back; pull carriage in with abs.

Proper Form Key Points: Lift hips high; push from arms.
No sinking in the lower back.

Description: Hands on bar; lift hips to pull in.
Legs circle; lift hips; roll down.
Wide leg circles in straps; roll.
Pull straps back while lifting chest.
Proper Form Key Points: Keep neck long; reach toes back.

Description: Lean back from knees in one line.
Proper Form Key Points: Hips forward; don't break at waist.

Description: Large circles with legs in straps.
Side bend against the shoulder rest.

Proper Form Key Points: Keep hips square to the footbar.

Description: Grasp ankles; rock on the box.
Proper Form Key Points: Kick into hands to lift chest.
Rotate from the waist; sit tall.

Description: Pike to one-leg lift toward sky.
Side plank; lift leg/arm to star.

Proper Form Key Points: Control the return of the spring.
Use obliques to lift the hips.
Pivot on back foot; stay long.

Description: Pelvic lift with one leg extended.
One foot on floor; one on rest.
